paymentTokensToBoard mapping - Settles the auction if all tokens are sold","custom:security-considerations":"- Ensure proper token transfers and balance updates - Handle potential reentrancy risks","details":"Allows users to buy tokens from an active auction","params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to purchase","ark":"The address of the Ark contract","rewardToken":"The address of the reward token being auctioned"},"returns":{"paymentAmount":"The amount of payment tokens required to purchase the specified amount of reward tokens"}},"finalizeAuction(address,address)":{"custom:effects":"- Updates the auction state - May transfer unsold tokens - May initiate boarding of payment tokens","custom:internal-logic":"- Retrieves the auction data - Calls the finalizeAuction function of the DutchAuctionLibrary - Settles the auction - if an ark doesn't require keeper data, the raised funds will be boarded autoamtically","custom:security-considerations":"- Ensure the auction has ended before finalizing - Handle potential edge cases with unsold tokens","details":"Finalizes an auction after its end time has been reached","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract","rewardToken":"The address of the reward token that was auctioned"}},"getAuctionInfo(address,address)":{"custom:effects":"- No state changes (view function)","custom:internal-logic":"- Retrieves the auction data from the auctions mapping","custom:security-considerations":"- Ensure the returned data doesn't expose sensitive struct containing auction details"}},"getCurrentPrice(address,address)":{"custom:effects":"- No state changes (view function)","custom:internal-logic":"- Retrieves the auction data - Calls the getCurrentPrice function of the DutchAuctionLibrary","custom:security-considerations":"- Ensure the auction is ongoing when calling this function","details":"Gets the current price of tokens in an ongoing auction","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract","rewardToken":"The address of the reward token"},"returns":{"_0":"The current price of the auction"}},"getObtainedTokens(address,address)":{"custom:effects":"- No state changes (view function)","custom:internal-logic":"- Retrieves the value from the obtainedTokens token","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract","rewardToken":"The address of the reward token"},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of harvested rewards for the specified Ark and token"}},"harvest(address,bytes)":{"custom:effects":"- Updates obtainedTokens mapping","custom:internal-logic":"- Calls the harvest function on the specified Ark - Updates the obtainedTokens mapping with harvested amounts","custom:security-considerations":"- Validate the Ark address - Ensure proper handling of rewardData","details":"Harvests rewards from the specified Ark without auctioning or reinvesting","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract to harvest rewards from","rewardData":"Additional data required by a protocol to token","custom:security-considerations":"- Ensure only authorized addresses can call this function - Check for existing auctions before starting a new one","details":"Starts a Dutch auction for the harvested rewards of a specific Ark and reward token","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract","paymentToken":"The address of the token used for payment in the auction","rewardToken":"The specified Ark and returns them to the caller","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract to sweep tokens from","tokens":"The addresses of the tokens to sweep"},"returns":{"sweptAmounts":"The parameters","details":"Sweeps tokens from the specified Ark and starts an auction for them","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract to sweep tokens from","paymentToken":"The address of the board(address,address,bytes).custom:effects: - Transfers payment tokens to the Ark - Resets the paymentTokensToBoard mapping
board(address,address,bytes).custom:internal-logic: - Checks if the Ark requires keeper data - Approves and boards the payment tokens to the Ark
board(address,address,bytes).custom:security-considerations: - Ensure only authorized addresses can call this function - Validate the Ark address and data - Handle potential failures in the boarding process
board(address,address,bytes).details: Boards the auctioned token to an Ark

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.data: Additional data required by the Ark to board rewards
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token to board the rewards to

buyTokens(address,address,uint256).custom:effects: - Transfers tokens between the buyer and the contract - Updates the auction state - May settle the auction if all tokens are sold
buyTokens(address,address,uint256).custom:internal-logic: - Retrieves the auction data for the specified Ark and reward token - Calls the buyTokens function of the DutchAuctionLibrary - Updates the paymentTokensToBoard mapping - Settles the auction if all tokens are sold
buyTokens(address,address,uint256).custom:security-considerations: - Ensure proper token transfers and balance updates - Handle potential reentrancy risks
buyTokens(address,address,uint256).details: Allows users to buy tokens from an active auction

params.amount: The amount of tokens to purchase
params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token being auctioned

returns.paymentAmount: The amount of payment tokens required to purchase the specified amount of reward tokens

finalizeAuction(address,address).custom:effects: - Updates the auction state - May transfer unsold tokens - May initiate boarding of payment tokens
finalizeAuction(address,address).custom:internal-logic: - Retrieves the auction data - Calls the finalizeAuction function of the DutchAuctionLibrary - Settles the auction - if an ark doesn't require keeper data, the raised funds will be boarded autoamtically
finalizeAuction(address,address).custom:security-considerations: - Ensure the auction has ended before finalizing - Handle potential edge cases with unsold tokens
finalizeAuction(address,address).details: Finalizes an auction after its end time has been reached

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token that was auctioned

getAuctionInfo(address,address).custom:internal-logic: - Retrieves the auction data from the auctions mapping
getAuctionInfo(address,address).custom:security-considerations: - Ensure the returned data doesn't expose sensitive information
